    Located across the street from Campbell Community Center, residents can enjoy a professional, outdoor walking/running track, football and soccer fields, swimming, a skate park, a fitness center, and the many classes provided to Campbell residents such as Tennis, weight training, kick boxing and more. Some fees apply. Located within 5 minute walk of downtown Campbell, residents enjoy easy access to numerous restaurants ranging from family style to upscale nightlife, shops, a weekly Farmer's market and city events and concerts.

item.description:
In the heart of downtown San Francisco is a rarely available, bright, HUGE studio and corner unit. Affordable, optional garaged parking space available.

Apartment Features:

- Two large walk-in closets (one can be used as a small office or fits a full-size bed).
- Windows are set to the west for maximum natural lighting.
- Large Eat-in kitchen.
- Newly installed flooring throughout living space.
- Fresh paint.
- Water and Garbage included.

Neighborhood Features:

This vibrant area is filled with numerous ethnic and top-rated restaurants within a few minutes of walking or driving distance. Convenient entertainment, culture and fresh food with a multi-screen movie theatre within 3 blocks, the SF Main Library within 5 blocks and local farmers market twice weekly. Easy access to variety of bars and nightlife on the Geary and Polk Street corridors. World-class shopping at Union Square with Cable Cars reachable in 10 minutes walking distance. Transportation to any part of town or Bay Area is easily accessible via multiple bus lines, MUNI Metro or BART at Civic Center Station.

Three Laundromats are within a block's radius.

For your convenience, an optional remote-accessed covered parking space can be provided for an additional fee of $200/mo., making this truly a commuter's dream.

Terms:

* 12-month lease.
* Rent: $1,150 per month for the apartment unit only. ($200 additional for one garaged parking space)
* Security Deposit: $1,450 required ($1,750 if parking space is included).
* A Credit Check is required. ($20 per application, applied towards 1st month's rent if rented to you.) Income verification is also required. If you have good enough credit, you will get the 13th month free. Ask about it.

Please contact Daniel at (415) 518-1871 to schedule a viewing.
No dogs or pets. Water and Garbage service included.

item.description:
Beautiful, light-filled, 1,446 sq. ft. unfurnished upper unit designed with a spacious open floor plan, three bedrooms, two full baths, vaulted ceilings and many windows and skylights. Green design features keep this home comfortable year-round, including radiant floor heating, double-paned windows throughout, energy-efficient lighting and appliances, and excellent insulation.

The first bedroom features a balcony and the master bedroom suite contains a walk-in closet and separate master bath.

There is ample storage, including a linen closet, finished attic space and two additional outdoor storage closets. There are laundry hookups in the unit in addition to a community laundry room.
